list.item: Suggested controlled vocabulary form EN15907: "original negative", "dupnegative", "positive", "original positive(reversal film)", "dupe positive", "Lavender", "image negative", "sound negative", "non-film analogue carrier", "non-film digital carrier".

list.label: Definicija
list.item: Vrsta fizičnega nosilca, ki se uporablja za manifestacijo avdio-visualnega objekta.
list.label: HOPE element
list.item: hopeEntity/descriptiveUnit/domain/audioVisualUnit/carrierType
list.label: Originalna definicija
list.item: "The type of physical carrier used for the manifestation. Digital manifestations may be bound to a physical carrier (such as DVD) or exist without a defined carrier (such as online streaming media, podcasts, etc.)."
list.label: Izvorni element
Izvorna definicija
list.item: "The type of physical carrier used for the manifestation. Digital manifestations may be bound to a physical carrier (such as DVD) or exist without a defined carrier (such as online streaming media, podcasts, etc.)."
list.label: XML element
list.item: AUDIOVISUALNI[@audiovisElType='avCarrierType']
list.label: Tip vnosa
list.item: Opcijski (Minimalno: 0, Maksimalno: neomejeno)

list.label: Definicija
list.item: Širina filmskega traku ali kakšnega drugega nosilca.
list.label: HOPE element
list.item: hopeEntity/descriptiveUnit/domain/audioVisualUnit/gauge
list.label: Originalna definicija
list.item: "The width of the film stock or other carrier (such as magnetic tape) used for the manifestation. Should include value and unit (e.g. "35 mm", "1/2 in.")"
list.label: Izvorni element
XML element
list.item: AUDIOVISUALNI[@audiovisElType='avGauge']
list.label: Tip vnosa
list.item: Opcijski (Minimalno: 0, Maksimalno: neomejeno)
list.label: Uporaba
list.item: Potrebno je navesti mersko enoto, npr. milimetre kot mm.

list.label: Definicija
list.item: Čas trajanja prve znane filmske manifestacije, merjeno v minutah in sekundah.
list.label: HOPE element
list.item: hopeEntity/descriptiveUnit/domain/audioVisualUnit/originalDuration
list.label: Originalna definicija
list.item: "The running time of the first known manifestation of a cinematographic work, measured in minutes and second."
list.label: Izvorni element
XML element
list.item: AUDIOVISUALNI[@audiovisElType='avOrigDuration']
list.label: Tip vnosa
list.item: Opcijski (Minimalno: 0, Maksimalno: neomejeno)

list.label: Definicija
list.item: Skupni fizični, logični in časovni okvir trajanja manifestacije fimskega dela.
list.label: HOPE element
list.item: hopeEntity/descriptiveUnit/domain/audioVisualUnit/originalLength
list.label: Originalna definicija
list.item: "The total physical, logical or temporal extent of the manifestation of a cinematographic work, or of the item from a manifestation. Physical extent is the total length of the medium carrying the manifestation or item. Logical extent is the number of discrete units, e.g. image frames, bytes (octets), etc., of which the manifestation or item is composed. Temporal extent is the running time under normal or specific playback conditions (e.g. a specific frame rate)."
list.label: Izvorni element
XML element
list.item: AUDIOVISUALNI[@audiovisElType='avOrigLength']
list.label: Tip vnosa
list.item: Opcijski (Minimalno: 0, Maksimalno: neomejeno)

list.label: Definicija
list.item: Razmerje med višino in širino slike filma.
list.label: HOPE element
list.item: hopeEntity/descriptiveUnit/domain/audioVisualUnit/aspectRatio
list.label: Originalna definicija
list.item: "The ratio between width and height of the image. For anamorphic formats, this element should contain the aspect ratio of the projected image rather than that on the carrier. Some aspect ratios are known not only by numeric values, but also by names (e.g. “full frame”, "Cinemascope")."
list.label: Izvorni element
XML element
list.item: AUDIOVISUALNI[@audiovisElType='avAspectRatio']
list.label: Tip vnosa
list.item: Opcijski (Minimalno: 0, Maksimalno: neomejeno)

list.label: Definicija
list.item: Ime barvnega sistema ali procesa.
list.label: HOPE element
list.item: hopeEntity/descriptiveUnit/domain/audioVisualUnit/colourSystem
list.label: Originalna definicija
list.item: "A name for the colour system or process."
list.label: Izvorni element
XML element
list.item: AUDIOVISUALNI[@audiovisElType='avColourSystem']
list.label: Tip vnosa
list.item: Opcijski (Minimalno: 0, Maksimalno: neomejeno)

list.label: Definicija
list.item: Ime sistema, s katerim je posnet in predvajan zvok.
list.label: HOPE element
list.item: hopeEntity/descriptiveUnit/domain/audioVisualUnit/soundSystem
list.label: Originalna definicija
list.item: "The name of the system by which sound is recorded either on the carrier, on a separate medium, or as part of the digital encoding (e.g. Western Electric (Westrex) Movietone, RCA Photophone, Tobis, Dolby Digital, etc.)."
list.label: Izvorni element
XML element
list.item: AUDIOVISUALNI[@audiovisElType='avSoundSystem']
list.label: Tip vnosa
list.item: Opcijski (Minimalno: 0, Maksimalno: neomejeno)

The Library of Congress. "Encoded Archival Description." Pridobljeno 20. 11. 2013. https://www.loc.gov/ead/.

Lemmens, Bert, Joris Janssens, Ruth Van Dyck, Alessia Bardi, Paolo Manghi, Eric Beving, Kathryn Máthé in Armin Straube. The Common HOPE Metadata Structure, including the Harmonisation Specifications: Version 1.1. 31/05/2011.
